name: A World set on Fire
description:
Step into a World of Fire and try to escape. This Game was made for GamedevInsiders-Jam with the theme "if you stop, you die". Post your Highscore in the comments if you like, so I can consider changing difficulty.

Used Technologies:

- Unity 2020.1.10f1

- Asesprite

- Krita

- Blender

External Assets:

- Song(mixkit.co): "Group the Wall" by Michael Ramir C.

- Font(dafont.com): "Press Start 2P by Codeman38
